metadata.description: How would the world be changed if the mentally deranged were allowed to determine reality? Monica McCoy, a recent college graduate, begins her employment with the top secret 'Dream Research Program' at Breckenridge State Hospital. Nothing can prepare her for the horrors she encounters upon reporting for duty. What ensues is a tale of madness, reality, and the supernatural chronicling one woman's journey as she comes face to face with the horror of The Dead Cell!
metadata.name: Dead Cell
